NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
joM^i f
May 27# 1959
Dr • Maurice F • Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek# Michigan
Dear Maurice:
Thank you very much for your May 22 letter# authorizing extension of our
present grant period to September 30# 1959, and approving expenditure of
$3#868*13 from the $4,100 contingency item in this budget for the payment
of salaries# retirement benefits and workman’s compensation for the Execu¬
tive Director and Associate Director through July and August.
Since this reduces the sum needed for salaries under the new grant# beginning
July 1# 1959 # I am enclosing herewith a revised budget for the 1959-60 fiscal
year. The only items changed in this budget, from the form originally sub¬
mitted# are:
under Summary
Salaries: from $30,800 to $26,931.81
Administrative expense (5%) from $2,665 to $2,471.59
under Operational Salarie^ad- VVages
Executive Director: from $12,000 to $10,000
Associate Director: from $9,200 to $7,666.66
Retirement Benefits: from $2,28 0 to $1,980.48
Workmen’s Compensation: from $420 to $384.67
If there are any questions on any of this, please let us know. Once again,
our sincere thanks.
hjs:rs
CC: NAEB Board
NAEB Finance Committee
Cordially,
Harry J. /Skornia
Executive Director
